section.name: Requirements
section.p: ld2solr requires Java 7 or 8, and Apache Maven version 3 or above.

section.name: Build
section.p: Having procured a source tree from the ld2solr Github project, execute a normal Maven package build in the top directory: mvn package
You will then find an executable JAR in the target/ subdirectory.

section.name: Building the site
section.p: If you would like to have a local copy of this site, including JavaDocs, coverage reports, and other development paraphernalia, perform a build as described above, then perform a Maven site build: mvn site
You will find the generated documentation in target/site/.

section.name: Deploying the site
section.p: If you would like to have to publish the site to Github, perform a Maven post-site build: mvn post-site
You will have to have supplied appropriate credentials for UVaLib's Github account. See here for details.
